!Fishermen's Guild Member: In the Swamp of Screams, if you hunt *Splinter Stakatos, Splinter Stakato Soldiers, Splinter Stakato Drones, Needle Stakato workers, Needle Stakato Drones, or Frenzy Stakato Soldiers*, you can get the sweet aromatic fluid the water spirits love.
